title: Personalized Language Learning Program Based on Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language proficiency and basic operational skills with digital devices
context.additional_context: Vocational training program for in-service elementary teachers to improve language proficiency. Combines smartphone-based learning activities with monthly face-to-face workshops

learning_goals: Ability to improve personalized vocabulary recommendation systems based on analysis of learners' language usage patterns

Learners can interpret personalized diagnostic reports from language learning analytics tools (e.g., Duolingo, Memrise) and develop a customized learning strategy plan within a week to address the 3 main weaknesses identified in the report.
Adaptive quizzes provided through mobile learning platforms can address over 80% of individual learning gaps

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
